Key Match Events: Phil Salt will lead England as captain in his debut in this role on Welsh soil
Pre-Game Insights: Phil Salt steps up as captain due to Jos Buttler's injury
Marcus Trescothick is interim coach, with Brendon McCullum set to take over white-ball formats
The series is crucial for determining the team's direction under the new coach
England's performance is expected to improve from previous failures
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match is the first of the T20I series
The game is at Cardiff, with a hybrid pitch discussion
Gloucestershire will host a pitch walkthrough to address concerns
